title: Foiling The Beast:  Episode 67
description:
He was a member of mensa, a computer programmer and always polite and courteous.  But Alan Hopkinson had always had an unhealthy interest in young girls.  In this episode of the UK True Crime Podcast, we examine his life and what happened to those who were unfortunate enough to cross his path.

Enjoy the podcast and want more? Listen to 12 bonus episodes plus other exclusive content at www.patreon.com/uktruecrime

Want to talk about the show or any other aspect of UK True Crime? Join our friendly facebook group today:

https://m.facebook.com/groups/1479468325433430 www.uktruecrime.com
